tiger_dream_keeper.title: Tigress the Handsome keeper of dreams
tiger_dream_keeper.description: Handsome Tigress is a stylish and kind stuffed tiger cub in fancy overalls with a bow. He's not just a toy — he's the keeper of children's dreams and secrets. Its soft body, kind eyes and cozy texture make it an ideal companion for sleeping, playing and cuddling.

bunny_hopping.title: Bunny Hopping is a storyteller
bunny_hopping.description: The bunny is a stuffed animal with pigtails and a book in its paws. She loves to tell fairy tales and share good stories before going to bed. Her kind eyes, cozy outfit and delicate texture make her an ideal companion for toddlers.

cutie_luna_antistress.title: Cutie Luna-antistress gives honey
cutie_luna_antistress.description: Charming Moon bee with a jar of magic honey is a soft anti—stress toy that you want to hug. Bright design, wings, bows and kind eyes make her a favorite of children.

bella_the_squirrel.title: Bella the squirrel loves nuts
bella_the_squirrel.description: Bella is a charming squirrel with pigtails and a cute outfit. In her paws is a favorite nut, and on her face is a kind smile. Soft, cozy and stylish, Bella will become the best friend for playing, sleeping and decorating the children's room.
